data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 17491, Version Hash: 94bdaea25aa31a3d69a408a644701345e9ff7a83
data.actual_result: Firefox doesn't get reduced to desired attenuation but instead it shows in volume-mixer as reduced but it actually isn't
data.expected_result: Firefox volume should get reduced to desired attenuation
data.short_description: While using push-to-talk the volume of firefox will not get reduced to my desired attenuation
data.steps_to_repro: - start firefox 60.0.2 - open (for example) a twitch stream - join a discord voice channel - speak (with push-to-talk and attenuation set to "when I speak")
